Name: Teacher Assistance Manager

CreationRequirements.InitialRequirement: im a teacher, have multiple groups and need help to manage the assistance list for each group. need to be able to create groups with students and need to generate an assistance list for the current day, at the end of the week I need a summary for the percentage os assitance per group
CreationRequirements.ReviewedRequirement: Design a software module to help teachers manage student attendance across multiple groups. The module should allow the teacher to create and manage groups of students, record daily attendance, and generate weekly attendance summaries. The teacher should be able to view and edit attendance records for each group, with the system automatically calculating attendance percentages at the end of the week. The module should ensure data integrity and provide an intuitive interface for managing all attendance-related tasks.
FunctionalDetails: Record daily attendance for each group
UserInteraction: Teacher creates a new group and adds students to it
Teacher selects a group and marks attendance for the current day
Teacher views the attendance list for a specific day
Teacher edits attendance records if needed
Teacher generates and views the weekly attendance summary

MinimumFeatures.Description: Add, edit, and delete students in a group
Mark daily attendance for each group

GoodToHaveFeatures.Description: Customizable attendance statuses (e.g., present, absent, excused)
Filter and search attendance records by date or student

BarRaiserFeatures.Description: Integration with school calendar for holidays and events
Mobile access for attendance marking on-the-go

Description: Attendance management system for teachers to handle student groups, daily attendance recording, and weekly summary generation with percentage calculations
